name: assemblyai-samples
description: Ready-to-run samples for the AssemblyAI JavaScript SDK

scripts.speaker: npx tsx speaker-diarization.ts
scripts.test: echo "Running all samples..." && npm run transcribe && npm run streaming && npm run lemur
scripts.help: echo "Available commands:" && echo "  npm run setup      - Setup environment and install dependencies" && echo "  npm run transcribe  - Run basic transcription sample" && echo "  npm run streaming   - Run real-time streaming sample" && echo "  npm run lemur       - Run LeMUR AI analysis sample" && echo "  npm run speaker     - Run speaker diarization sample" && echo "  npm run test        - Run all samples" && echo "  npm run clean       - Clean up dependencies" && echo "  npm run help        - Show this help message"

author: AssemblyAI
